title: Ticket #5940: Clean up DAG VARS parsing as related to ALL_NODES
description:
I want to get the ALL_NODES feature into 8.5.8 with the minimum amount of additional work, so I'm leaving this as-is for right now. Anyhow, because of that I re-used as much of the existing parsing code as possible.

The issue is that the existing code actually re-parses most of the VARS line for every node when ALL_NODES is specified for the node name -- it would be a lot more efficient to just parse the line once and generate some kind of list of var name/var value pairs to plug into all of the nodes.

(Hmm -- even a better thing would be to just store one copy of the var name/var value, and somehow have all of the nodes point to that. I'm not sure how much work that would be...)
remarks:
2017-Apr-06 16:54:32 by wenger:
One thing with storing a single copy of the var name/var value -- that wouldn't work if the var value is $(JOB) or $(RETRY).
